scripts.dev:prepare: npx rimraf ./crts && openssl genrsa -des3 -passout pass:x -out ./certs/server.pass.key 2048 && openssl rsa -passin pass:x -in ./certs/server.pass.key -out ./certs/server.key && npx rimraf ./certs/server.pass.key && openssl req -new -key ./certs/server.key -out ./certs/server.csr && openssl x509 -req -sha256 -days 365 -in ./certs/server.csr -signkey ./certs/server.key -out ./certs/server.crt
scripts.dev: npm run clean && parcel serve src/index.html --cert ./certs/server.crt --key ./certs/server.key
scripts.build: npm run clean && npx parcel build src/index.html
